A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved it. I thought it was bold with the plot and elements of Star Wars movies. The visuals and many of the scenes take your breath away. But if you're a hard core fan who doesn't like change\, this movie will not be for you\, but then again\, it's not for you. This movie is for a whole new generation of Star Wars fans\, or fans who want something new.
